message.name: process_goes_to_blocked_list
message.value: process %s is blocked for %s units of time

message.name: process_goes_to_end_of_ready_list
message.value: process %s executes for %s and goes to the end of the ready list

message.name: process_goes_to_ready_list
message.value: process %s goes back to the ready list

message.name: process_wins_lotery
message.value: process %s wins the lottery with ticket number %s

message.name: context_switch
message.value: a context switch happens, taking %s units of time
